title: Minecraft 主机版 Patch 1.52/TU54/CU44/Patch 24/Patch 4 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ff98sha 于 2017-6-29 08:40 编辑 
主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。
迎接新的正式版吧！
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
 
Change log for Patch 1.52 - June 27th 2017
2017.6.27 1.52 更新日志

Added Mini Game Heroes Skin Pack.增加小游戏英雄皮肤包Added 7 New Trophies增加7个新奖杯Added Biome Scale Slider增加生物群系规模滑块Added Find Balanced Seed option增加寻找平衡种子的选项Added Llamas, new mobs that can be tamed and ridden, and will form caravans when led.增加羊驼，能够被驯服和骑乘的新生物，会结成群体Added Parrots. Try letting them ride your shoulder, but be careful what you feed them!增加鹦鹉，尝试让它们骑在你的肩膀上，但是当你喂它们要小心了Added Woodland Mansions, and the mobs that inhabit them: Vindicators, Evokers, and the annoying Vexes that they summon.增加林地府邸，其中有卫道士 召唤师和恼鬼Added Explorer Maps to help you find Ocean Temples and the new Woodland Mansions, and the new Cartographer Villager to sell them to you.增加探索地图帮助你找到海洋神庙和林地腹地，新的制图师村民会卖这个Added Observer Blocks.增加观察者方块Added Totem of Undying item.增加不死图腾Added Curses of Binding and Vanishing.增加绑定和消失诅咒Added Spawn Eggs to the Creative Menu for Skeleton Horses, Zombie Horses, Elder Guardians, Strays, Wither Skeletons, Husks, and Zombie Villagers.增加骷髅马 僵尸马 远古守卫者 流劅 凋灵骷髅 尸壳 僵尸村民的怪物蛋Updated Textures for Mule and Donkey Spawn Eggs.更新骡和驴的生成蛋的材质Added dyeable beds增加染色床Added display of status effects on the HUD.在HUD中增加显示状态效果Reduced the amount of Food Bar drain player many actions cause, but increased the drain caused by health regeneration.减少玩家的行为消耗的饱食度，但增加生命回复所消耗的饱食度Torches can now be placed on the full-block side of Stairs火把现在能放到楼梯的完整的一边Iron bars, glass panes and fences adjacent to the full-block side of a stair will now visually connect.铁栅栏，玻璃板和栅栏能够连接到楼梯的完整的一边Carpet and snow layers can now be placed on top of upside-down stairs.地毯和雪层能够被放到倒置的楼梯上Beds are now bouncy, though they do not completely reduce all fall damage.床可弹跳，但它们不会减少所有的掉落伤害



Bug Fixes
Bug修复

MCCE-3488 - Villager trading broken村民交易错误MCCE-4793 - Loose dual wielded item when you die死亡时掉落正在使用的物品MCCE-4731 - Shulker box miss colored in Natural texture pack在自然材质包中潜影箱没有颜色MCCE-4910 - Shulker Boxes on Natural texture pack自然材质包中的潜影箱MCCE-4746 - Sleeping with an elytra带着滑翔翼睡觉MCCE-3357 - End portals stop appearing after respawned dragon death在重生的末影龙死亡后末地传送门不出现MCCE-2998 - Slime Block Glitch史莱姆方块故障MCCE-4715 - Potions firing from dispenser crash.发射器射出药水崩溃MCCE-2744 - Fences Attaching to Nether Brick Fences栅栏连接地狱栅栏MCCE-3165 - Tutorial World教程世界MCCE-4830 - Skin-Pack: Magic: The Gathering, Ajani skin has bugs皮肤包： 魔法：聚集 的皮肤有BUGMCCE-4840 - Color of shulker box incorrect in Natural texture pack在自然材质包中潜影盒的颜色错误MCCE-4834 - skeletons spawn in a 2 high space with trapdoors on ceiling在天花板上骷髅生成在2格高的活板门上MCCE-4663 - Weapon durability shows when interface opacity is low当接口不透明度低时武器耐久显示MCCE-4727 - Textures wrong材质错误MCCE-3973 - Donkeys don't spawn驴不生成MCCE-4710 - Invisible Chat Box聊天盒无法显示MCCE-1899 - Squid spawning limit super low...鱿鱼的生成数量限制太低MCCE-3386 - Game freezes游戏冻结MCCE-2983 - Piston translocation will not work in future versions. Bug?活塞移动MCCE-2479 - It's possible to step up 1 pixel height from Grass Paths to Farmland blocks.从草径到耕地可以增加1格像素高MCCE-4644 - Birch boat texture is broken in cartoon texture pack桦木船的材质在卡通材质包中坏了MCCE-3352 - No trail after shulker projectile on PS4PS4中潜影盒发出的弹射物没有痕迹MCCE-3005 - new Minecraft mob attacking heart dropping animation not working on ps4PS4中新的Minecraft怪物在攻击时不会有掉心的动画



    外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 Mojang官方博客（英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Console Edition version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细，很慢）
